name: administrators
description: Grants access to all applications and their administration features (excluding Site administration)

lozenges.name: Access
lozenges.title: Users in this group can access JIRA Service Desk, JIRA Software and JIRA Core

lozenges.name: Admin
lozenges.title: Users in this group have admin permission in JIRA administration

name: atlassian-addons
description: Reserved for use by installed Atlassian Connect add-ons

name: atlassian-addons-admin
description: Grants product administration access to Atlassian Connect add-ons that requested it during installation.

lozenges.name: Access
lozenges.title: Users in this group can access JIRA Service Desk, JIRA Software and JIRA Core

lozenges.name: Admin
lozenges.title: Users in this group have admin permission in JIRA administration

name: jira-administrators
description: Grant access to the administration features of JIRA

lozenges.name: Admin
lozenges.title: Users in this group have admin permission in JIRA administration

lozenges.name: Default
lozenges.title: Users granted access to JIRA Core will be added to this group

name: jira-servicedesk-users
description: Grants access to JIRA Service Desk

lozenges.name: Default
lozenges.title: Users granted access to JIRA Service Desk will be added to this group

lozenges.name: Default
lozenges.title: Users granted access to JIRA Software will be added to this group

name: site-admins
description: Grants access to all applications, their administration features and Site administration, which includes managing users and bills

lozenges.name: Access
lozenges.title: Users in this group can access JIRA Service Desk, JIRA Software and JIRA Core

lozenges.name: Admin
lozenges.title: Users in this group have admin permission in JIRA administration

name: system-administrators
description: Reserved for use by Atlassian Support to perform system maintenance tasks

lozenges.name: Access
lozenges.title: Users in this group can access JIRA Service Desk, JIRA Software and JIRA Core

lozenges.name: Admin
lozenges.title: Users in this group have admin permission in JIRA administration
